V.ii.1.A.1.g
.
Rating Activity Responsibility for Reviewing Evidence
The rating activity is responsible for reviewing the evidence, including
recognizing the need for evidence in relation to a claim, and
determining the
admissibility of the evidence
weight to be afforded evidence that is presented
need for additional evidence, and
sufficiency of and/or need for a physical examination.
Reference
:Â  For more information on determining who has authority to request examinations and/or medical opinions, see
M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, 2.A.1
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Principles of Reviewing and Weighing Evidence
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
